Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Playa Garden Selection Hotel & Spa in Muro (Playa de Muro), you'll be convenient to Albufera Natural Park. This 4-star aparthotel is within the vicinity of Alcudia Port and San Jaume Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 225 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 12:30 PM
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Albufera Natural Park - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Alcudia Port - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
San Jaume Church - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Campanet Caves - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Pollensa Port - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Ufanes Fonts - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Cala Barques - 15.7 km / 9.8 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi
Lluc Monastery - 20.7 km / 12.9 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 29 km / 18 mi
Castillo de Alaro - 29.1 km / 18.1 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 31 km / 19.2 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 32.9 km / 20.5 mi
Puig Mayor - 33.2 km / 20.6 mi
Caves of Drach - 33.3 km / 20.7 mi

The preferred airport for Playa Garden Selection Hotel & Spa is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 43.1 km / 26.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
